abilities.name: War Howl
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a **BLOOD CLAWS** unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re‑roll the Wound roll. While this model is leading a **WOLF GUARD HEADTAKERS** unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Battle-lust
abilities.rule: Each time this model ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Frostfang weapon.
